com.hybris.services.entitlements.atdd.keywords

Class AbstractEntitlementsKeywordLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hybris.services.entitlements.atdd.keywords.AbstractEntitlementsKeywordLibrary
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EntitlementsAddGrantPropertyKeywordLibrary, EntitlementsAddUsageKeywordLibrary, EntitlementsBuilderKeywordLibrary, EntitlementsDetailsKeywordLibrary, EntitlementsExecuteKeywordLibrary, EntitlementsExecuteManyKeywordLibrary, EntitlementsRevokeKeywordLibrary

    @Configurable
public abstract class AbstractEntitlementsKeywordLibrary
extends Object
    Base class for keyword implementations.

      • executeAndExpectException

        protected static <T> T executeAndExpectException(AbstractEntitlementsKeywordLibrary.ExpectExceptionCallback<T> callback,
                                                 String expectedExceptionType,
                                                 String expectedExceptionMessage)
        Executes the given callback and expects an exception of the given type with the given message.
        Type Parameters:
        T - return type of the callback
        Parameters:
        callback - callback that should raise the expected exception
        expectedExceptionType - type of expected exception, may be null if no exception is expected
        expectedExceptionMessage - message of expected exception, may be null if no exception is expected
        Returns:
        value returned by the callback
